dw_card.name: Generic Card
dw_card.description: This component is used as a general purpose Card element in a carded layout

dw_top_nav.name: Top Nav
dw_top_nav.description: This is documentation of the top navigation of the theme. Includes support for branding(logo), navigation, search field, notification, user profile menu.

dw_list.name: Lists
dw_list.description: This component represent all the list styles of the theme

dw_btn.name: Buttons
